info.title: AmazonAds Web API
info.description: List of RESTful services to manage Amazon Advertiement which includes Campaigns, Adgroups, Keywords, Profiles and Performance reports

Bearer.name: Authorization
Bearer.description:
Enter 'Bearer' [space] and then your valid token in the text input below.

Example: "Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9"
